title: Governance Fault & Trace Report (GFTR) Schema
description: Standardized cryptographic structure for documenting CRITICAL and TERMINAL GSEP-C failures.

report_id.description: Unique, immutable ID for the failure event.

attested_cism_hash.description: Cryptographic hash of the Certified Intermediate State (CISM) prior to failure.

veto_condition.description: The specific mathematical condition or gate that triggered the failure (e.g., ¬S03, S01 <= S02 + ϵ).

agent_signature.description: Attestation signature of the responsible agent (GAX/CRoT) certifying report integrity.
